val.body:
## Web Components
### Features
- **pricing-table**
  - create pricing table component (#8674)
- **pictogram-item**
  - allow for changing of pictogram color (#8682)
- **masthead**
  - add `skip-to-content` web component (#8677)
- **structured-list**
  - extend component from carbon-web-components (#8493)

### Fixes
- **vendor**
  - fix to pull direct source for internal vendor packages (#8734)
- **video-player**
  - ensure only automatic thumbnails get updated. (#8680)
- **masthead**
  - fix search combobox `aria-expanded` value (#8662)
- **background-media**
  - leadspace search - with image and card section offset background image (#8673)
- **rollup**
  - use non-hash filenames for cdn chunk files (#8608)
- **leaving-ibm**
  - provide attribute to trigger modal (#8583)
- **table-of-contents**
  - fixing mobile issues (#8553)
- **filter-panel**
  - return focus to selected elements (#8492)
- **deps**
  - update dependency carbon-components to v10.55.1 (#8483)
  - update dependency @carbon/telemetry to v0.1.0 (#8481)
- **axe-core**
  - resolved accessibility errors (#8453)
- **tabs & tabs extended with media**
  - adjust the layout to align with the defined grid (#8394)

### Housekeeping
- **storybook**
  - remove `addon-a11y` package (#8685)
- **deps**
  - update dependency @carbon/icon-helpers to v10.29.0 (#8672)
  - update dependency flatpickr to v4.6.11 (#8578)

  - update dependency @carbon/type to v10.43.1 (#8479)
  - update dependency @carbon/icons-react to v10.48.0 (#8477)

- **codesandbox**
  - set fixed version for @carbon/icon-react package (#8675)
- **browserstack**
  - remove ff on windows testing for browserstack automate (#8666)
- **carousel**
  - add testing for carousel default, with images, with videos, with media (#8538)
- **upgrade**
  - upgrade to carbon 10.56.0 (#8591)
  - upgrade to carbon 10.55.2 (#8577)

- **vendor**
  - fix to pull direct source for internal vendor packages (#8734)

  - update aria attribute errors (#8689)

  - set fixed version for @carbon/icon-react package (#8675)
- **upgrade**

## Web Components
### Features
- **scrolling-utility**
  - add new utility to mimic dotcom-shell functionality (#8434)
- **accessibility-testing**
  - introduce cypress-axe-core (#8233)
- **toc**
  - add an event to trigger harvesting of anchor tags (#8329)
- **filter-panel**
  - add view all button for filter groups (#8258)
- **universal-banner**
  - introducing component (#8237)

### Fixes
- **plex**
  - replace `gstatic` font references with akamai (#8502)
- **cta-section**
  - [cta section - with content items]: pictograms have extra spacing (#8457)
- **card-group**
  - fix grid mode knob and prevent incorrect border colors (#8373)
  - prevent extra top "borders" in safari (#8320)
- **tabs-extended**
  - change anchor-based tabs to button-based tabs (#8365)
- **carousel**
  - apply same height function to heading used in dds-card-cta (#8336)
- **content-block-horizontal**
  - ensure border attribute returns correctly (#8382)
- **deps**
  - update dependency carbon-components to v10.54.0 (#8408)
  - update dependency @carbon/layout to v10.37.0 (#8405)
- **card-in-card**
  - ensure that the card image is clickable (#8361)
- **e2e**
  - fix to fixtures in e2e integration tests (#8350)
- **filter-panel**
  - update heading when knob changes (#8362)
- **various modals**
  - address focus trapping issues (#8232)
- **card-pictogram**
  - show body copy on both pictogram positions (#8359)
- **table-of-contents**
  - let vo interact with the destination content (#8253)

  - add axe-core npm dependencies (#8354)

val.name: v1.31.0
val.body:
We are happy to announce the release of `Carbon for IBM.com v1.31.0`! This release comes with a bunch of new features, as well as our regular bug squashing.

- `leadspace` now supports background media
- `filter-panel` filter groups now have a `view all` button
- `cta` with videos can now display an optional thumbnail
- `search-with-typeahead` can now perform scoped searches
- `masthead` searches can now be grouped
- Lots and lots of bug fixes

## Web Components
### Features
- **filter-panel**
  - add view all button for filter groups (#8188)
- **cta**
  - optional video thumbnail (#8200)
- **search-with-typeahead**
  - add scoped search support (#8096)
- **masthead**
  - add grouped search support (#8004)
- **leadspace**
  - add support for background-media usage (#7773)

### Fixes
- **rollup**
  - fix to named exports declaration for marked dependency (#8384)
- **cypress**
  - adding back plugins file (#8280)
- **cloud-masthead**
  - update the services and utilities to use canary (#8250)
  - replace cookie auth with window object status (#8149)
- **tabs-extended**
  - add vertical arrow key support (#8243)
  - tooltip calculation (#8099)
- **link-with-icon**
  - adjust left icon placement style & clean up (#8238)
- **footer**
  - change cypress intercept for translation to use raw data (#8244)
  - stabilization of e2e tests (#8241)
- **content-block-mixed**
  - remove conflicting element ids (#8219)
- **filter-panel**
  - return to original heading after clearing filters (#8153)
- **deps**
  - update dependency carbon-web-components to v1.21.0 (#8210)
  - update dependency carbon-components to v10.52.0 (#8209)
  - fix to marked dependency issues (#8172)
  - update dependency carbon-components to v10.51.0 (#8125)
  - update dependency @carbon/layout to v10.35.0 (#8120)
- **feature-section-card-link**
  - remove incorrect role (#8197)
- **masthead**
  - change hasprofile to accept a string instead of boolean (#8202)
  - add padding top to masthead-composite & cloud-masthead-container (#8068)
- **card-in-card**
  - add null check for card-in-card-image (#8191)
  - prevent new tab from opening twice on firefox (#8072)
- **video-player**
  - move focus to iframe after kaltura embed (#8181)
- **content-section**
  - update child elements alignment to the top (#8182)
- **leadspace-with-search**
  - refactor for correct styles to be added (#8152)
- **cta**
  - add imports to be able to render cdn files (#8156)
- **a11y**
  - remove invalid role attribute to be a11y compliance (#8157)
- **e2e**
  - mock ibm-common.js in e2e tests (#8147)
- **card-cta**
  - adjusting the conditional aria-label video duration (#8145)
- **left-nav**
  - fix expanded menu section focus trapping (#8074)
- **cta-section**
  - add background color (#8144)
- **content-item-horizontal-thumbnail**
  - adjust mobile spacing (#8067)
- **table-of-contents**
  - fix erroneous heading check (#8059)
- **video**
  - use component width to build video thumbnail (#7914)
- **codesandbox**
  - fixed duplicate workspace names

### Housekeeping
- **browserstack**
  - use exclude arg for browserstack
  - add build names to browserstack automate runs (#8069)
- **package**

val.name: v1.30.0
val.body:
This release comes with great new features, as well as our regular bug squashing.

- Full markdown support for dds-card and dds-content-section
- Refined Masthead mobile scroll interactions
- Improved accessibility to dds-card-pictogram
- Multiple style fixes in various components
- Increased e2e test coverage
- many more bugs squashed!


## Web Components
### Features
- **masthead**
  - hide and show upon scroll on mobile (#7982)
- **karma-accessibility-checker**
  - add to web components (#7997)
- **card-pictogram**
  - add design updates to improve mobile accessibility & hover interactions (#7795)

### Fixes
- **dotcom-shell**
  - stop intersection logic if modal is open (#8083)
- **locale-modal**
  - fix focus trapping (#8089)
- **feature-section**
  - responsive card styles (#8104)
- **static-card**
  - react wrapper story not showing (#8106)
- **masthead**
  - ensure sectionurl is passed in and has default value (#8084)
  - align react and wc mobile menu styles (#7925)
  - account for platform name in active item logic (#7890)
- **card**
  - announce content change on keyboard focus (#8031)
  - ensure copy can render markdown (#7871)
- **karma-accessibility-checker**
  - errors from stories (#8012)
- **browserstack**
  - add missing dependency ws (#8006)
- **feature-cta**
  - add wait to test (#7992)
- **card-group**
  - update storybook (#7924)
- **card-section-carousel**
  - update carousel width (#7940)
- **deps**
  - update dependency @carbon/layout to v10.34.0 (#7906)
- **feature-card**
  - make entire card clickable on mobile viewports (#7853)
- **contentblockhorizontal**
  - add border-bottom option & knob (#7832)
- **card-section-image**
  - fix to image check in e2e tests (#7897)
- **cta-section**
  - use correct bottom spacing and spacing between item rows (#7764)
  - ensure buttons are not allowed as cta types (#7782)
- **localemodal**
  - disable region button when no countries present (#7840)
- **leadspace**
  - fix gradient rotation for leadspace centered (#7777)
- **carousel**
  - add null check for carousel same height method (#7769)

### Housekeeping
- **github-pages**
  - introduce react wrapper next environment
- **storybook**
  - add button-cta documentation in cta readme and update masthead's platform url documentation (#8030)
- **feature-section**
  - add e2e-storybook  (#8025)
- **content-item**
  - add e2e tests (#8018)
- **github-actions**
  - rename from `staging` to `next` (#8022)
- **deploy**
  - replace deployment of canary/next envs to github pages (#8013)
- **codesandbox**
  - add card-section-carousel csb example (#7991)
- **masthead**
  - storybook demo cleanup (#7779)
  - add missing sandbox dependency (#7848)
- **deps**
  - browserstack-cypress-cli downgrade (#8003)
  - upgrade browserstack-cypress-cli (#7937)
  - update dependency babel-plugin-istanbul to v6 (#7987)
  - upgrade marked to 1.2.9 (#7935)
  - update dependency tsickle to ^0.43.0 (#7903)
  - update dependency mini-css-extract-plugin to ^0.12.0 (#7902)
  - update dependency http-server to ^0.13.0 (#7865)
  - update dependency flatpickr to v4.6.9 (#7857)
- **housekeeping**
  - use optional chaining for filtering (#7808)
- **lightbox-media-viewer**
  - add embedded video player e2e tests (#7870)
  - e2e storybook (#7778)
- **card**
  - update card-group, card-in-card, and image readmes (#7912)
  - update wrapper story and docs with card logo (#7786)
  - cleanup card e2e storybook tests (#7787)
  - add default e2e storybook tests (#7748)
- **link-with-icon**

val.name: v1.27.0
val.body:
We are happy to announce the release of Carbon for IBM.com v1.27.0! This release comes with a bunch of new features, as well as our regular bug squashing.

- New React wrapper: 
    - `filter-panel` 
- `leadspace-with-search` now has sticky functionality
- Repositioned the storybook elements
- Increased e2e testing coverage
- Updated the `feature-section` hover and active image styles
- Updated the `filter-panel` accordion state
- Added codesandbox example for `background-media`
many more bugs squashed!
Check out the full changelog, available at:
https://github.com/carbon-design-system/carbon-for-ibm-dotcom/releases/tag/v1.27.0
Thank you for being an active member of our community! If you see any issues, you can reach out to us at @dds-support, or open an issue on our board!

## Web Components
### Features
- **filter-panel**
  - introducing react wrapper (#7470)
- **leadspace-with-search**
  - added sticky scroll functionality (#7421)
- **storybook**
  - position elements to top left (#7397)

### Fixes
- **search-with-typeahead**
  - remove focusout code (#7596)
  - remove focusout code
  - fixed mobile focus bug (#7589)
- **browserstack**
  - update cypress configs for browserstack (#7543)
- **footer**
  - address different style issues (#7392)
- **leadspace with search**
  - sticky behavior not working (#7517)
- **carousel**
  - ensuring copy is aligned (#7522)
- **masthead-e2e**
  - update overflow test (#7511)
- **card-section-carousel**
  - react wrapper story (#7503)
- **content-item-horizontal**
  - fixed grid issues (#7361)
- **content-section**
  - expose content section (#7351)
- **card**
  - update card styling & layout (#7463)
- **locale-modal**
  - fix to properly type in locale modal e2e tests (#7477)
- **filter-panel**
  - prevent accordion state resetting on input selection (#7452)
- **quote**
  - load plex serif font into storybook previews (#7437)
- **cta-block**
  - fix medium breakpoint layout and spacing (#7398)
- **card-cta**
  - apply hover effect to video thumbnail (#7380)
- **cta**
  - fix video name & desc sb rendering issue (#7382)

### Housekeeping
- **masthead**
  - revert change to masthead search focusout
  - add tests for e2e masthead - search open on load (#7526)
  - remove unnecessary percy and cy snapshots (#7495)
  - add tests for e2e masthead default (#7467)
- **upgrade**
  - upgrade to carbon web components 1.18.0 (#7547)
  - upgrade to carbon 10.47.0 (#7539)
  - upgrade to carbon 10.46.0 (#7399)
- **cypress**
  - fix to properly load mock translation data (#7520)
  - upgrade to 8.7.0 (#7518)
- **leadspace**
  - e2e tests for leadspace - tall with and without image (#7509)
- **e2e-masthead-l1**
  - adding testing for masthead with l1 (#7494)
- **masthead-custom**
  - add tests for custom menu items (#7487)
- **masthead-platform**
  - add check if next to logo and contains link (#7468)
- **deps**
  - remove node-sass and update gulp-sass (#7442)
- **e2e**
  - bumping up timeout configs for github actions (#7438)
  - add more browsers to browserstack testing config (#7412)
  - browserstack e2e tests for web components & react (#7379)
- **locale-modal**
  - added wait for locale search input field (#7419)
- **background-media**
  - add codesandbox example (#7402)

## React
### Features
- **filter-panel**
  - introducing react wrapper (#7470)
- **storybook**
  - position elements to top left (#7397)

### Fixes
- **browserstack**
  - update cypress configs for browserstack (#7543)
- **footer**

- **masthead**
  - set selected state for l1 menu items and mobile (#7530)
  - ensure reverse tabbing works in megamenu (#7368)
  - resolve react and proptypes warnings (#7401)

  - update overflow test (#7511)
- **content-section**
  - expose content section (#7351)
- **locale-modal**
  - fix to properly type in locale modal e2e tests (#7477)
- **quote**
  - load plex serif font into storybook previews (#7437)
- **gulp**
  - adjustment to react vendor builds (#7396)
- **mastheadsearch**

### Housekeeping

- **leadspace**
  - e2e tests for leadspace - tall with and without image (#7509)

We are happy to announce the release of Carbon for IBM.com v1.26.0! This release comes with a bunch of new features, as well as our regular bug squashing.
- New React wrappers:
  - Feature Section
  - Card Section Offset
- Content Group and Content Item can now be used directly as their own components
- Implemented data attribute transposition into our components to target elements within the Shadow DOM
- Updated printing styles for some of our components
- Card CTAs video thumbnail can now be disabled 
- Image components border can now be toggled
- Masthead accessibility improved even further 
- many more bugs squashed!

**Deprecation Notice:**  
Due to low usage, and the availability of more rapid full releases, we are discontinuing bi-weekly beta releases of Carbon for IBM.com.

val.name: v1.25.0
val.body:
We are happy to announce the release of `Carbon for IBM.com v1.25.0`! This release comes with a bunch of new features, as well as our regular bug squashing.

- New react wrappers:
  - `link-list-section`
  - `content-group-banner`
  - `content-block-simple`
  - `table-of-contents`
- Now `CTA video` allows for video title and description overrides within the `lightbox-media-viewer`
- `Leadspace` has a new `short` variation
- `Image` component supports a new optional border
- The `footer` has a new look and feel (functionality was kept)
- And last but not least, 16 bugs were fixed

### Deprecation notice  
- Expressive styles have been moved to the Carbon library.

## Web Components
### Features
- **link-list-section**
  - create react wrapper (#7162)
- **content-group-banner**
  - create react wrapper (#7115)
- **masthead**
  - add a logic that highlights the current and parent menu items within the masthead dropdown + mega menu based on the url (#6937)
- **content-block-simple**
  - add react wrapper (#7095)
- **lightbox-media-viewer**
  - title & description override (#7083)
- **expressive-theme**
  - sunset of the expressive theme (#7012)
- **cta**
  - enabling custom video title (#6983)
- **leadspace**
  - add short variation (#7026)
- **table-of-contents**
  - introducing react wrapper (#6998)
- **image**
  - support optional image borders (#7035)
- **video-player-composite**
  - support image and caption overrides (#7025)

### Fixes
- **cloud-masthead**
  - set masthead position to fixed on menu open (#7247)
  - ensure that true is passed to the has-contact attribute (#7107)
  - adjust the cookie to prod id & overlapping issue on v18 l1 nav (#7037)
  - set unique id for megamenu tabs instead of using title (#7024)
- **left-nav**
  - calculate offsettop to set top of left-nav (#7215)
- **cta-block**
  - clean up spacing (#7157)
- **feature-card**
  - resolve styling issues (#7149)
  - update stable selector (#7146)
  - updating color tokens (#7118)
- **content-group-pictogram**
  - icon size fix and alignment (#7086)
- **masthead**
  - wrap menu content when longer than the mobile or medium breakpoint (#7126)
  - handle overflow tabbing (#7085)
  - expressive sunset cleanup (#7100)
  - remove aria-selected from menu items (#7030)
- **logo-grid**
  - changed the card heading style to expressive (#7045)
- **video-player**
  - set tabindex of 0 to dds-video-player (#7105)
- **footer**
  - expressive sunset cleanup (#7103)
  - update footer a11y labels (#7042)
- **search-with-typeahead**
  - prevent focusout on button click in safari (#7069)
- **card-section-simple**
  - aligning component in storybook (#7062)
- **table-of-contents**
  - prevent extra space above table of contents (#6981)

### Housekeeping
- **footer**
  - updating styles to match new visual specs (#6855)
- **codesandbox**
  - update lit version (#7167)
  - update leadspace image (#7005)
- **back-to-top**
  - update react wrapper storybook content (#7120)
- **leadspace**
  - loading overlay background (#7113)
- **e2e**
  - introduce cypress for web components & react storybook (#7096)
- **housekeeping**
  - deprecate experimental components (#7047)
- **merge**
  - resolve merge conflicts
  - resolve merge conflicts
  - resolve merge conflicts
- **storybook**
  - sentence case story names (#6997)

## React
### Features
- **content-group-banner**
  - create react wrapper (#7115)
- **expressive-theme**
  - sunset of the expressive theme (#7012)
- **cta**
  - enabling custom video title (#6983)
- **masthead**
  - masthead l0 selected when child item is current page (#7040)
- **videoplayer**
  - support image and caption overrides (#7007)

### Fixes
